title: My pixel 2 phone screen turned off in the middle of operation and will not turn on anymore.
content:
My pixel 2 phone screen turned off in the middle of operation and will not turn on anymore.

My records show that I purchased this device on November 16, 2017.

What happened in detail:
- I searched in google-chrome for a video.
- Clicked the video and google-youtube opened.
- Google-Youtube logo was all messed up.
- Phone screen went black suddenly.
- Phone does not turn on anymore despite trying many times to turn the phone on:
-- Tried short press power button.
-- Tried holding power button for 90 seconds.
-- Tried holding power button with down volume for 90 seconds.
-- Tried charging for 20+ minutes on official charger... and on a different charger... and on my computer.
